translation.en: [man] Hey, tell Marie I'm on my way. I'm headed to the hospital now.
translation.de: Hey, sag Marie, ich bin unterwegs zum Krankenhaus.

translation.en: And tell her I love her.
translation.de: Sag ihr, dass ich sie liebe.

translation.en: And everything's gonna be okay.
Hey, call me when you get this and let me know what's going on.
translation.de: Ruf mich zurück. Ich will wissen, was los ist.

translation.en: -Marie? -Nah, it's DiAngelo.
-You talk to her yet? -I can't get through to her.
Her cousin Teresa isn't picking up either.
She's gonna pull through, man. The baby, too.
translation.de: Die schafft das. Das Baby auch.

translation.en: Yeah. They will.
Hey, look, I gotta go, I gotta try her again. I'll catch up with you later.
translation.de: Ich leg auf, ich versuch's weiter. Bis später.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll catch you later, man. Call me back when you hear some--
translation.de: Ja, alles klar. Melde dich, wenn du was hörst.

translation.en: You okay, Pete?
What happened?
He came out of nowhere.
[officer] DiAngelo.
What condition's he in? Male, female, what?
I don't know.
What the fuck you do, Jablonski?
translation.de: Was ist das für 'ne Scheiße, Jablonski?

translation.en: [officer] Who's over there, Di?
Stay on the fucking road.
Put it in the trunk.
You talk to your wife yet?
How's she doing?
What the fuck are you talking about?
No one saw you, right?
Yo, Di!
This is what's gonna happen.
You're gonna leave right now. Go.
-[officer] Di, what the fuck? -Shut up!
-No, we got to call it in. -He's dead.
There's nothing you can do for him.
translation.de: Du kannst nichts für ihn tun.

translation.en: Did you go over there?
Did you see what's in that ditch?
translation.de: Weißt du, was im Graben ist?

translation.en: They're gonna crucify you for this.
Every one of us is gonna pay for this. You understand what I'm saying, right?
translation.de: Dafür müssen wir alle bezahlen. Du verstehst mich doch, oder?

translation.en: No one's gonna find him here, okay?
No one's gotta know.
I said I got this.
Get to the hospital. Go be with your wife.
translation.de: Fahr ins Krankenhaus zu deiner Frau.

translation.en: Drive away.
[DiAngelo] Get it out of the road.
Where do you want me to put it?
-[Marie] Yeah. -What are you doing to her?
Oh, Pete.
It's okay. Don't look so worried. It's just a little spotting.
translation.de: Schon ok. Schau nicht so besorgt. Es war nur eine kleine Blutung.

translation.en: Did you see Teresa? She was-- She just walked out.
translation.de: Hast du Teresa gesehen? Sie ist eben raus.

translation.en: Dr. Taranaweh ran an ultrasound. I can pull it up for you if you want.
translation.de: Ich kann Ihnen die neuen Ultraschallaufnahmen zeigen.

translation.en: No, why don't you get the fucking doctor?
Yeah. Sure.
Seriously, Petey?
That was rude.
No, you said you were bleeding.
It stopped.
-You-- -It's fine. I promise.
Hey, come here. Come here.
We're past the five month mark, Pete.
I have a good feeling, you know?
translation.de: Ich hab ein gutes Gefühl, weißt du?

translation.en: Yeah, I know. No, it's just...
translation.de: Ja, ich weiß. Es ist nur...

translation.en: -You just scared me there. -I know. I know.
What happened?
It was nothing. No, we just...
-We were working. -[nurse] Doc will be here in a minute.
translation.de: -Es war bei der Arbeit. -Der Arzt kommt.

translation.en: [nurse] It'll turn itself off.
Babe.
There he is.
Little Poke.
-[woman] Don't lose anymore, all right? -[school bell rings]
translation.de: Du sollst keine mehr verlieren, ok?

translation.en: Those things are expensive. Last pair. All right.
translation.de: Die sind teuer. Das ist die letzte. Ok.

translation.en: Excuse me.
-You waiting for somebody? -Yeah, my brother.
He's supposed to be here.
What grade is he in?
Sixth.
No, sixth graders, they left already, so that means he left too.
translation.de: Nein, die sechste Klasse ist schon weg. Also ist er auch weg.

translation.en: -Is there somebody you want to call? -Yeah, I just did. My mom.
translation.de: -Willst du jemanden anrufen? -Habe ich eben. Meine Mom.

translation.en: Maybe your brother walked home?
translation.de: Ist dein Bruder zu Fuß nach Hause?

translation.en: He didn't.
He takes his bike to school.
[woman] What your brother would be doing down here is beyond me.
translation.de: Ich wüsste nicht, was dein Bruder hier wollen könnte.

translation.en: He's not here. He's at the park.
translation.de: Er ist nicht hier. Er ist im Park.

translation.en: [woman] Do you see him?
Where else do you think he could be?
translation.de: Wo könnte er denn noch sein?

translation.en: I don't know.
What the fuck?
Little shit.
-[door shuts] -Fuck off.
[Ryan] I, uh...
kind of sat on this. Sorry.
translation.de: Ich hab mich draufgesetzt. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: It's okay.
What is that?
[woman] It's a seagull.
My son Brenton made it.
[girl] Wow. It's cool.
Put on your seat belts. If we hurry up, we can get you home
translation.de: Schnallt euch an. Wenn wir uns beeilen, seid ihr da,

translation.en: before it really starts kicking up.
[bartender] Ready for another?
Yeah.
-I got tied up on the turnpike. So sorry. -[clerk] All rise.
translation.de: -Ich stand im Stau. Tut mir leid. -Erheben Sie sich.

translation.en: Superior court of Hudson County, state of New Jersey, is now in session,
translation.de: Es tagt der oberste Gerichtshof von Hudson County, New Jersey,

translation.en: Honorable Richard Blatt presiding.
Please sit.
Your Honor, the State presents complaint number...
translation.de: Euer Ehren, die Staatsanwaltschaft legt Anklagenummer...

translation.en: Uh, it's... Got it. Uh, it's...
translation.de: Das ist... Ich hab's. Es ist...

translation.en: complaint number 5977.
This is the defendant's third shoplifting charge.
translation.de: Es ist die dritte Anzeige wegen Ladendiebstahls.

translation.en: Ms. Lufts stole $200 in cat food.
translation.de: Ms. Lufts stahl Katzenfutter im Wert von 200 Dollar.

translation.en: You've got the wrong defendant.
That's not the complaint number I'm looking at, Counselor.
translation.de: Bei mir steht eine andere Anklagenummer, Frau Anwältin.

translation.en: Get your paperwork in order before you walk into my courtroom.
translation.de: Erledigen Sie Ihren Papierkram, bevor Sie zu mir kommen.

translation.en: -Your Honor, I have it right here. It-- -[judge] Next.
[man] Our county is the gold standard in law enforcement.
translation.de: Wir sind ein Vorbild für eine Rechtsdurchsetzung,

translation.en: Working hand in hand with its citizens.
translation.de: die eng mit den Bürgern zusammenarbeitet.

translation.en: The police violence we're witnessing
translation.de: Die Polizeigewalt, die wir in schwarzen Gemeinden

translation.en: in black and brown communities throughout America
translation.de: Die Polizeigewalt, die wir in schwarzen Gemeinden anderswo in Amerika erleben, hat in New Jersey keinen Platz.

translation.en: has no place in New Jersey.
translation.de: anderswo in Amerika erleben, hat in New Jersey keinen Platz.

translation.en: As prosecutor, good police and community relations have been a priority in my administration.
translation.de: Die Beziehungen zwischen Polizei und Gemeinde haben für mich Priorität.

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. Connelly, when are you announcing your run for governor?
translation.de: Wann geben Sie Ihre Gouverneurskandidatur bekannt?

translation.en: [man] Darius!
[woman] He was a little off-beat though.
-Gotta tell you. -[man] No.
I saw Brother Jerrel and you saw Brother Jerrel too.
translation.de: Ich hab Bruder Jerrel gesehen. Du auch.

translation.en: And who he was looking at.
-[man chuckling] -Oh, you are crazy!
'Saiah, you know that woman is married.
I know, I'm just saying she looked good after she lost all that weight.
translation.de: Sie sieht gut aus, seit sie abgenommen hat.

translation.en: Brenton? Baby, you home?
Brenton! Your mama's calling you, boy!
He should be here by now. Or did he forget about tonight too?
translation.de: Er sollte schon da sein. Hat er es vergessen?

translation.en: No, Uncle Seth's coming home, and that's all he could talk about.
translation.de: Nein, Onkel Seth kommt. Er redet von nichts anderem.

translation.en: He is so excited. He's got a surprise for the both of you.
translation.de: Er ist so aufgeregt. Hat eine Überraschung für euch.

translation.en: What? That he forgot his uncle's homecoming?
translation.de: Was? Dass er Onkel Seth vergisst?

translation.en: Aw, come on, he's either in the yard or upstairs in his room. I'll check.
translation.de: Er ist entweder im Garten oder oben in seinem Zimmer. Ich seh nach.

translation.en: I see he's been messing with my TV again.
translation.de: Er war wieder an meinem Fernseher.

translation.en: I can't turn it on if he's done playing with his damn video games.
translation.de: Er geht nicht an, wenn er Videospiele gespielt hat.

translation.en: Well, maybe you should leave it off seeing as you got a whole house to paint.
translation.de: Lass ihn aus, du musst noch ein Haus streichen.

translation.en: [automated voice] You have one new message.
[man] Yeah, we're looking for the parents of Brenton Butler.
translation.de: Ja, wir suchen die Eltern von Brenton Butler.

translation.en: Could you call the South District police station when you get the message?
translation.de: Rufen Sie bitte das South District Polizeirevier an.

translation.en: It concerns your son.
I heard the callout.
[officer] Found him with a BMX bike that's pretty banged up.
translation.de: Wir fanden ihn und ein kaputtes BMX.

translation.en: [detective] Got any ID on the kid?
translation.de: Wisst ihr, wer der Junge ist?

translation.en: Brenton Butler. Black male, 15 years old.
translation.de: Brenton Butler. Schwarz, männlich, 15 Jahre alt.

translation.en: Notified the parents. He's at the ER at Jersey City Medical Center in surgery.
translation.de: Eltern sind benachrichtigt. Er ist auf der Unfallstation im OP.

translation.en: [detective] Anyone have a conversation with the parents? [officer] Wanted to wait for you.
translation.de: -Sprach jemand mit den Eltern? -Ich wollte auf Sie warten.

translation.en: -He's alive? -[officer 2] Yeah.
He's probably fucking brain dead. It's like the Red Sea down there.
translation.de: Sicher hirntot. Da sieht's aus wie das Rote Meer.

translation.en: -Hey. I'm sorry, brother. Um... -You gotta wait.
I'm sorry. It's my son. He's been in a car accident.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Mein Sohn hatte einen Unfall.

translation.en: You got to wait in line.
We're sorry, we don't know what's going on with our son. Please?
translation.de: Wir wissen nicht, was mit unserem Sohn ist. Bitte?

translation.en: -Thank you, thank you, thank you. -His name is Brenton. Brenton Butler.
[receptionist] There's no "r." It's "Benton."
Gave me the wrong spelling. I'll need you to fill this out.
translation.de: Falsch geschrieben. Füllen Sie das aus.

translation.en: -Do you have your insurance card, ID? -[woman] Yeah.
Have a seat, the doctor will talk to you when he's done in surgery.
translation.de: Setzen Sie sich. Der Arzt kommt nach der OP.

translation.en: Surgery?
Just have a seat. The doctor will talk to you when he's done.
translation.de: Setzen Sie sich, der Arzt kommt.

translation.en: -Why would he be in surgery? -I don't know.
They don't tell us these things.
translation.de: So was sagt man uns nicht.

translation.en: Please, just have a seat.
Surgery?
[Isaiah mutters] Why is he in surgery?
Why do they have him in surgery? Why's he in surgery?
translation.de: Warum wird er operiert? Was für eine OP?

translation.en: Father God, praise be to you.
translation.de: Gelobt seist du, Vater im Himmel.

translation.en: Your glory, your mercy.
Watch over our baby.
Please don't let my baby die, Father God. I don't know...
translation.de: Lass unser Kind nicht sterben, lieber Gott. Ich weiß nicht...

translation.en: I ask this in your holy name.
Please, Father God. Look after my...
translation.de: Bitte, Vater im Himmel, beschütze meinen...

translation.en: Fuck. [breath trembling]
You're fine, you're fine, you're fine. -You're fine. -[windshield wipers scraping]
I'd been sleeping in my car under the Pulaski the whole day.
translation.de: Ich hab den ganzen Tag in meinem Wagen geschlafen. Unter der Pulaski.

translation.en: Nobody bothers me there,
except when that cop came banging on my window.
translation.de: Aber dann schlug der Bulle ans Fenster.

translation.en: Did you drive through the park this morning?
translation.de: Fuhren Sie heute früh durch den Park?

translation.en: No, I-- I told you I was sleeping under the Pulaski all day.
translation.de: Nein, ich sagte doch, ich hab den ganzen Tag unter der Pulaski geschlafen.

translation.en: [man] Drinking too, right? -All the live long day. -[knocking, door opens]
translation.de: Und getrunken, was? Den ganzen lieben Tag.

translation.en: You the on-call AP?
Yeah, I'm KJ Harper. They just put me back on an hour ago.
translation.de: Ja, ich bin KJ Harper. Ich wurde vor einer Stunde angerufen.

translation.en: Right. One of my CIs tipped us off to this guy.
translation.de: Alles klar. Ein Informant gab uns den Tipp.

translation.en: Saw Gramps here cleaning blood off the front of his car
translation.de: Er sah den Opa heute früh Blut vom Wagen wischen,

translation.en: near the park this morning.
We just picked him up riding around near there, two sheets to the wind.
translation.de: Wir haben ihn dort aufgegriffen, sternhagelvoll.

translation.en: Why's narcotics interested in a hit-and-run?
translation.de: Was will das Drogendezernat mit Fahrerflucht?

translation.en: We just got a tip.
-Hmm. -And he looks good for it.
Two prior DUIs, it's a matter of time before he killed someone.
translation.de: Zwei Anzeigen wegen Alkohol am Steuer, ein Toter wäre kein Wunder.

translation.en: That's in the report. You read that, right?
Of course I did.
I just didn't realize reports were read by every Joe in the district.
translation.de: Ich wusste nur nicht, dass jeder Heini die Berichte liest.

translation.en: [chuckles] Every...
I've seen you before, down at the courthouse.
translation.de: Ich hab Sie schon im Gerichtssaal gesehen.

translation.en: You work the shoplifting cases.
You got this tied up with a bow.
translation.de: Das hier ist als Geschenk verpackt.

translation.en: You got enough for a plea without lifting one bejeweled nail.
translation.de: Für die Anklage müssen Sie keinen Finger krümmen.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -I know how to do my job, but thanks. Well, then do it.
translation.de: -Ich kenne meinen Job. Aber danke. -Dann machen Sie ihn.

translation.en: Mr. Dorsey seems to believe he was asleep in his car.
translation.de: Mr. Dorsey behauptet, er hätte im Auto geschlafen.

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna say?
"Oh, I just rolled over some kid's head in my Buick, my bad"?
translation.de: "Bin gerade über den Kopf eines Jungen gefahren, mein Fehler"?

translation.en: [DiAngelo laughing] Come on.
Okay. Thanks.
The trash can's down there.
This fucking guy. It's your boy, Jablonski.
He keeps calling.
[Dorsey] I didn't kill no kid. I was sleeping.
translation.de: Ich hab keinen umgefahren. Ich hab geschlafen.

translation.en: [detective] Yo! Ms. Harper!
Yo! Hey!
Are you the assistant prosecutor on my job?
translation.de: Sind Sie für diesen Fall zuständig?

translation.en: I'm Joe Rinaldi. You can call me Fish.
translation.de: Ich bin Joe Rinaldi. Nennen Sie mich Fish.

translation.en: Uh, former NYPD,
but I just got this new place out on the water. It's fucking beautiful.
translation.de: bin jetzt hergezogen, unten ans Wasser. Ist verdammt schön.

translation.en: The kids love it, so I figured, fuck it, why not Jersey.
translation.de: Kinder lieben es, da dachte ich, dann eben Jersey.

translation.en: -Did you need something from me? -Uh, yeah.
Yeah. The guys in there said that you're ready to file this job.
translation.de: Die Jungs drinnen sagen, dass Sie Anklage erheben.

translation.en: -You got enough for that? -Yep.
Yep. Okey-dokey. Um...
Yo, are you going to the hospital? I need to pick up the victim's belongings.
translation.de: Fahren Sie ins Krankenhaus? Ich muss die Sachen des Opfers holen.

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, I am. -Mind if I ride with?
Sure. Yeah.
If we pass a bodega en route, think about picking up some mints.
translation.de: Ich schlage vor, Sie besorgen sich Minzbonbons.

translation.en: I'm just-- I don't care. I'm just saying, out of respect for the family.
translation.de: Ich... Mir ist das egal, aber aus Respekt vor der Familie.

translation.en: I can smell you like a mile away. Not a good look.
translation.de: Das riecht man meilenweit. Ist nicht so schön.

translation.en: Actually, I have to go to the office for some paperwork, so...
translation.de: Eigentlich muss ich erst Papierkram erledigen.

translation.en: Get your own ride there.
What'd they do to my boy? What'd they do to my boy?
-[man] Be with you every step of the way. -[Seth] It's all good, bro.
It's all right.
Oh, Latrice.
[Seth] It's gonna be all right. It's gonna be all right.
Brenton, he was counting the days to see you in uniform.
translation.de: Brenton konnte es nicht erwarten, dich in Uniform zu sehen.

translation.en: It's been a while. He's so proud.
translation.de: Du warst lange weg. Er ist sehr stolz.

translation.en: And he wants to hear all the stories about Afghanistan and Kandastan.
translation.de: Er will alle deine Geschichten hören, über Afghanistan und Kandastan.

translation.en: Are you the parents of Brenton Butler?
-Uh, yeah. -He's stable.
I was able to relieve the pressure on his brain,
translation.de: Ich konnte den Druck auf sein Gehirn verringern.

translation.en: but there's been significant impact,
primarily to the posterior cortex, the back of his head.
translation.de: vor allem an der hinteren Parietalrinde, seinem Hinterkopf.

translation.en: What does that mean?
He could lose the ability to function independently.
He could be on a ventilator for a long time.
What happened? Was he at school?
translation.de: Was ist passiert? War er in der Schule?

translation.en: -The police haven't told us. -[doctor] I don't know. I'm sorry.
Uh, can we see him now?
Not everyone right now, just the parents.
-You can come with me. -Okay.
-Where's DiAngelo at? -Come here.
Not picking up his phone. No one's picking up.
translation.de: Er geht nicht ans Telefon. Keiner geht ran.

translation.en: [Pete] Now what the fuck is going on?
DiAngelo would fucking lose his mind if he saw you here.
translation.de: DiAngelo würde ausflippen, wenn er dich hier sähe.

translation.en: We're taking care of it.
The kid's alive. Now that's what you call taking care of it? Huh?
translation.de: Der Junge lebt. Das nennt ihr "schon regeln"?

translation.en: You think we fucking knew that?
Look, all I'm saying is there's got to be another way.
translation.de: Ich sage nur, das muss auch anders gehen.

translation.en: This is wrong, and you know it is.
translation.de: Das ist falsch. Und das weißt du auch.

translation.en: This whole thing's gonna blow up.
And we're all gonna go to prison for a fucking accident.
translation.de: gehen wir alle in den Knast. Wegen eines Unfalls.

translation.en: A white cop and a black kid?
Don't you watch the news?
There are no fucking accidents anymore, and you know it.
translation.de: Es gibt keine Unfälle mehr. Das weißt du auch.

translation.en: The assistant prosecutor's filing papers on a guy tonight. It's over.
translation.de: Die Staatsanwältin hat den Schuldigen schon. Es ist vorbei.

translation.en: What guy?
Who cares, man? Not you.
Excuse me, I just started the Narcotics Unit here.
translation.de: Entschuldigung, ich bin neu im Drogendezernat.

translation.en: DiAngelo's team?
You know who's um... who's working the hit-and-run in the park?
translation.de: Wer arbeitet an der Fahrerflucht im Park?

translation.en: Another new guy, Rinaldi. He's out, left an hour ago.
translation.de: Ein anderer Neuer, Rinaldi. Ist vor einer Stunde weg.

translation.en: -[Pete] Know when he's gonna be back? -I have no idea.
Do you want to leave a message?
What about the captain? You got his name?
translation.de: Und der Captain? Wie heißt er?

translation.en: You got a report, you can turn it in to your supervising officer.
translation.de: Geben Sie Ihre Berichte Ihrem Vorgesetzen.

translation.en: I gotta talk to the captain. Direct.
translation.de: Ich muss mit dem Captain sprechen. Direkt.

translation.en: I'll leave my cell, all right?
translation.de: Ich gebe Ihnen meine Nummer, ja?

translation.en: Just make sure he gets it.
Yep.
Got the kid's clothing. How about you?
translation.de: Ich habe seine Sachen. Und Sie?

translation.en: Get all your personal business taken care of?
Pick up some milk? Go to the bank? That's good. That's important.
translation.de: Milch gekauft, bei der Bank gewesen? Gut. Das ist wichtig.

translation.en: [Fish] Mr. Butler? Mrs. Butler?
Who are you?
We're with the prosecutor's office. We're looking for the parents.
translation.de: Die Staatsanwaltschaft. Wir suchen die Eltern.

translation.en: Yes.
I'm Detective Rinaldi. This is KJ Harper.
translation.de: Detective Rinaldi. Das ist KJ Harper.

translation.en: [Isaiah] What happened to my son?
-They said he was in a car accident. -[Latrice] Yeah.
No one's talked to us. The police haven't said anything.
translation.de: Keiner redet mit uns. Die Polizei sagt nichts.

translation.en: [Fish] Uh, we need some privacy right now to talk. Please.
translation.de: Wir sollten das vielleicht besser ungestört besprechen. Bitte.

translation.en: Joseph, can you give us a minute?
There's a waiting room at the end of the hall.
translation.de: Unten im Flur ist ein Warteraum.

translation.en: There'll be a bail hearing tomorrow before the arraignment at the courthouse.
translation.de: Es gibt eine Kautionsanhörung vor der Anklageverlesung

translation.en: [Seth] That's not what they asked.
We need to know exactly how this happened.
translation.de: Wir wollen wissen, was passiert ist.

translation.en: Your son was in a hit-and-run this morning at Liberty State Park.
translation.de: Fahrerflucht heute früh im Liberty State Park.

translation.en: [Isaiah] This morning?
They didn't call us until a few hours ago.
translation.de: Man rief uns vor ein paar Stunden an.

translation.en: That's when they found him, earlier tonight.
Two people found him. Their dog, actually.
translation.de: Von Passanten. Eigentlich von deren Hund.

translation.en: [KJ] We have the man in custody who we believe did this.
translation.de: Wir haben den mutmaßlichen Täter in Gewahrsam.

translation.en: I'll be filing paperwork with the judge tonight for his hearing first thing tomorrow.
translation.de: Die nötigen Papiere reiche ich ein. Seine Anhörung ist morgen früh.

translation.en: Can you be a little more clear with the details? I...
[KJ] Oh... Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
[Fish] It's a nice bike your son's got.
translation.de: Ihr Sohn hatte ein tolles Fahrrad.

translation.en: Five Kings rides them too. That series of BMX goes for some serious bank.
translation.de: Die Five Kings haben auch so welche. BMX-Räder sind nicht billig.

translation.en: What are you implying?
That Brenton's with a gang? Really? You gonna do this now?
translation.de: dass er in einer Gang ist? Wirklich?

translation.en: Wanna step back, whoever you are, and let me talk to the family?
translation.de: Treten Sie zurück. Ich rede mit der Familie.

translation.en: I am family, and I don't appreciate you coming up in here
translation.de: Ich gehöre zur Familie, und mir gefällt nicht,

translation.en: -and accusing my nephew-- -[Isaiah] Seth, let me handle this.
translation.de: -dass Sie meinen Neffen beschuldigen... -Ich mach das.

translation.en: We bought the bike.
Brenton's 16th birthday's coming up soon.
Now, what's gonna happen to the man who did this?
translation.de: Was wird jetzt mit dem Mann geschehen?

translation.en: Well, I'll be charging Mr. Dorsey
with leaving the scene of a motor vehicle accident
resulting in serious bodily injury.
And I'll suggest the maximum sentence for this type of felony.
translation.de: Ich beantrage die Höchststrafe für diese Tat.

translation.en: Which is what, exactly?
Three to five years.
My son laid in the cold...
translation.de: Mein Sohn lag da draußen in der Kälte...

translation.en: in the snow, in pain...
for hours.
And no one came for him except a dog.
translation.de: Und keiner kam zu ihm, außer einem Hund.

translation.en: He may never walk again.
translation.de: Er wird vielleicht nie wieder laufen.

translation.en: He may never wake up again.
And you're telling me that the person that did this
translation.de: Und Sie sagen, dass der Mann, der ihm das antat,

translation.en: will get three to five years?
translation.de: nur drei bis fünf Jahre kriegt?

translation.en: That man deserves to die for what he did to my son!
translation.de: Er verdient den Tod für das, was er meinem Sohn antat!

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Fish] My card.
-[KJ sighs] Damn it. -[alarm chirps]
You're locking yourself out doing it like that. Just click it once.
translation.de: Nur einmal drücken, sonst geht die Tür nie auf.

translation.en: I don't need to be told how to unlock my damn car.
translation.de: Ich weiß selber, wie mein Scheißauto aufgeht.

translation.en: What? Come on. Harper!
-[Fish] Come on! -[knocking]
-[starts engine] -But we gotta go to impound.
We gotta get the paperwork on Dorsey's car.
translation.de: Um die Papiere zu Mr. Dorseys Auto zu holen.

translation.en: -[Fish] Harper, please. -[knocking]
Harper, look. Look.
This is you when the night's done and you don't have to see me anymore.
translation.de: Das sind Sie, wenn wir fertig sind und Sie mich nicht mehr sehen müssen.

translation.en: [Fish] Thank you.
[pastor] Today we claim promises over our son Brenton.
translation.de: Heute erheben wir Anspruch auf das Versprechen an unseren Sohn Brenton.

translation.en: We believe in the healing power of faith and prayer
translation.de: Wir glauben an die Heilkraft des Glaubens und der Gebete

translation.en: and ask you to begin your mighty work in the life of Brenton.
translation.de: und bitten dich, dein machtvolles Wirken auf Brentons Leben auszuüben.

translation.en: Lord, your word speaks promises of healing and restoration.
translation.de: Herr, du sprichst die Worte der Erneuerung.

translation.en: And we thank you for the miracles you still perform today.
translation.de: Wir danken dir für all die Wunder, die du bewirkst.

translation.en: Is he gonna live?
What?
[Pete] I'm sorry. I was in the wrong room.
I'm gonna turn myself in.
But nobody's gotta know none of you were there.
translation.de: Niemand wird erfahren, dass ihr da wart.

translation.en: Just to be clear...
this is what's gonna happen.
Well, they are gonna fuck you...
for Ferguson...
Chicago, Baltimore...
for every white cop who ever killed a black kid.
translation.de: Für jeden weißen Cop, der je ein schwarzes Kind gekillt hat.

translation.en: -It was an accident. -No one gives a shit.
translation.de: -Es war ein Unfall. -Da scheißen die drauf.

translation.en: So, before you do anything,
I want you to think about what kind of father you'd be behind bars...
translation.de: was für ein Vater du wärst, wenn du im Knast sitzt.

translation.en: out of your son's life.
He ain't ever gonna know you.
You're a good cop, I see it. That's why I picked you.
translation.de: Du bist ein guter Cop. Das sehe ich, darum suchte ich dich aus.

translation.en: You and me? We're a dying breed.
translation.de: Wir beide sind eine aussterbende Art.

translation.en: And we take care of our own, you understand?
translation.de: Und wir kümmern uns um unser Team. Verstanden?

translation.en: [DiAngelo] Don't go behind my back again.
[Fish] I need the paperwork on my hit-and-run. It's Mac Dorsey's car.
translation.de: Ich brauche die Unterlagen. Der Name ist Mac Dorsey.

translation.en: Who's the owner of the car? We need a signature.
translation.de: Von wem? Wir brauchen eine Unterschrift.

translation.en: [Fish] I told you, Mac Dorsey.
translation.de: Hab ich doch gesagt, Mac Dorsey.

translation.en: They need your John Hancock!
You want to wait inside?
It'll take about half an hour to release the paperwork on the vehicle.
translation.de: Dauert eine halbe Stunde, bis die Papiere da sind.

translation.en: [KJ] I'll wait in the car.
Why? It's just a sign off.
[man] My supervisor's on break.
It's two in the fucking morning, what's he doing?
translation.de: Es ist zwei Uhr morgens. Wo ist er?

translation.en: [man] It's out of my hands. You can wait inside--
translation.de: Ich kann nichts tun. Warten Sie drinnen.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Rather freeze my balls off. Thanks.
translation.de: Ich frier mir lieber die Eier ab. Danke.

translation.en: Well, you gotta use the tape on the diaper, I told you that.
translation.de: Du musst das Klebeband an den Windeln benutzen.

translation.en: Or he's gonna be dropping shit bombs all over the place.
translation.de: Sonst verteilt er die Scheiße überall.

translation.en: Well, use your head.
How's Lizzie doing? Give her the hamburger yet?
translation.de: Wie geht's Lizzie? Hast du die Hamburger von mir gesehen?

translation.en: What do you mean what about them? They've been depressed all week.
translation.de: Wieso ich frage? Sie hatten die ganze Woche Depressionen.

translation.en: [Fish] You gonna hit that?
Because there's a cream.
[KJ] What?
I'm telling you, hobo herpes, it's a thing. I swear to God.
translation.de: Glauben Sie mir, mit Penner-Herpes ist nicht zu spaßen.

translation.en: Did you see Dorsey's face?
That pastor of yours found a chapel downstairs.
translation.de: Dein Pastor hat unten eine Kapelle gefunden.

translation.en: Wants you to head down for some holy rolling with Jesus.
Seth. Enough.
Why'd you tell the police we bought Brenton that bike?
translation.de: Wieso sagtest du, wir hätten das Rad gekauft?

translation.en: You saw his face.
He already had his mind made up that he was in a gang.
translation.de: Für ihn stand fest, dass Brenton in einer Gang ist.

translation.en: Because of what? The bike?
Where'd he get it from?
What was he doing in that park?
I won't tolerate you covering up for him anymore.
translation.de: Hör auf, ihn vor mir in Schutz zu nehmen.

translation.en: I know he'd been going back to the projects, and that park,
translation.de: Er war dauernd in der Siedlung und im Park.

translation.en: after I explicitly told him not to go.
translation.de: Obwohl ich es ihm verboten habe.

translation.en: 'Saiah, he misses his friends.
He misses his home. That's not his home.
translation.de: -Er vermisst sein Zuhause. -Es ist nicht sein Zuhause.

translation.en: Not anymore.
I don't know where he got it.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wo er's herhat.

translation.en: [Seth] You ought to go with him.
Go on, Tricey. I'll stay here with B.
translation.de: Na los, Trice. Ich bleibe hier bei B.

translation.en: He's gonna suffocate Brenton with all of his worries.
translation.de: Er wird Brenton ersticken mit seinen ganzen Ängsten.

translation.en: Just like he did you.
Kid must've been conscious for a while.
translation.de: Er war sicher eine Weile bei Bewusstsein.

translation.en: He's stuck between these two snowbanks here.
Crawling around, trying to find a way out, probably screaming for his mama.
translation.de: Hat versucht, da wegzukommen, und sicher nach seiner Mama gerufen.

translation.en: Crime scene photos give you the heebie-jeebies?
I don't need to look at them.
Isn't that, like, your job? [clears throat]
Nope. My job is to file paperwork.
translation.de: Nein. Mein Job ist es, Akten abzuarbeiten.

translation.en: File paperwork? You could file paperwork at any fuck-face firm down on the water.
translation.de: Akten? Wieso sind Sie dann nicht bei einer dieser Scheißkanzleien unten am Wasser?

translation.en: I'm sick of their eyes.
What?
Even when they're dead, it's...
They're looking at you, wanting answers.
translation.de: Sie sehen dich an und erwarten Antworten.

translation.en: You worked Homicide before?
How'd you get bumped to car crimes?
Car crimes. Heh... right.
Paralyzing a kid gets you three to five years,
translation.de: Ein gelähmtes Kind bringt bis zu fünf Jahre,

translation.en: but it's guaranteed you won't do most of that time.
translation.de: wovon man nur einen Teil absitzt.

translation.en: It's the greatest show on Earth, this shit.
translation.de: Die Scheiße ist eine einzige große Show.

translation.en: Did you see the driver's seat in Dorsey's car?
translation.de: Haben Sie den Sitz in Dorseys Auto gesehen?

translation.en: That narc cop said he had to chase him down,
translation.de: Der Drogen-Cop sagte, dass sie ihnam Park anhalten mussten.

translation.en: driving around outside the park, right? That's how they caught him.
translation.de: Der Drogen-Cop sagte, dass sie ihnam Park anhalten mussten. So wurde er gefasst.

translation.en: So?
So, how do you drive lying down?
Here comes asshat. Finally.
-[man] Have a good night. -Whatever. Go fuck yourself.
I'm gonna write up the kid's belongings in the morning. [sniffs]
translation.de: Ich mache die Auflistung der Sachen morgen früh.

translation.en: -Okay. -You know, I can get an Uber from here.
But, yo, it was good working with you. Yeah. You too.
translation.de: -Aber war schön, mit Ihnen zu arbeiten. -Ja. Gleichfalls.

translation.en: And um...
Listen, the dead don't need answers.
translation.de: Hören Sie, die Toten wollen keine Antworten.

translation.en: They're dead. Okay?
See you at trial in the morning. Don't forget about those mints, huh?
translation.de: Bis morgen bei Gericht. Denken Sie an die Minzbonbons.

translation.en: Asshole.
Fuck!
[nurse] Excuse me.
Are you family?
I'm his attorney.
[clerk] Complaint number 39012, the State versus Mac Henry Dorsey.
translation.de: Anklagenummer 39012. Der Staat gegen Mac Henry Dorsey.

translation.en: The counselor's appearance for the record.
[judge] Is the State gonna talk?
Judge, it's not my complaint number.
Then where the hell is my prosecutor?
[attorney] I'm sorry, Judge. I don't know.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, das weiß ich nicht.

translation.en: Next case.
[clerk] Complaint number 39013, the State versus Lonny Mendoza.
translation.de: Anklagenummer 39013, der Staat gegen Lonny Mendoza.
